name: Zonte
relicBonuses: At the start of battle, the bearer gains {CONDNAME_BUFF_AGILE}.
The bearer has an independent 25% chance to Dodge attacks.
At the start of its bearer's turn, this relic {ACTION_attacks} a random enemy twice for 50% normal damage.
At the start of battle, the bearer gains {CONDNAME_BUFF_SAVAGE}.
The bearer has an independent 25% chance to deal critical damage.
Enemies cannot move the bearer to the bottom of the {TIMELINE}.
After the bearer Dodges an attack or deals critical damage, this relic {ACTION_attacks} the enemy twice for 50% normal damage.
This relic and its bearer deal 3% more damage for each time the bearer has {ACTION_attacked} or {ACTION_cast} a spell in the current battle.
title: God of Wisdom
